items.sentence: Tom was angry with Mary because she was in his parking space.
There must be lots of places in Boston you haven\'t seen yet.
Tom admitted that he didn\'t really know how to speak French.
We\'re going to have a birthday party for Tom Monday evening.
The calendar on the refrigerator had Tom\'s birthday circled.
We have to hurry if we want to arrive at the station on time.
What puzzles me most is why Tom even bothered to go see Mary.
When I was in Boston, I used to eat out at least once a week.
When Tom was younger, he worked in Australia for three years.
I\'m sorry to disturb you, but there\'s a phone call for you.
If it\'s a good day tomorrow, let\'s go to the river to swim.
I can smell Mary\'s perfume. She must have been here earlier.
The police said that Tom may have fallen asleep at the wheel.
There were no passengers on the bus at the time of the crash.
Can you think of anyone who would want to rent my extra room?
I don\'t suppose that there\'s much chance of that happening.
I don\'t want you to think I\'m not happy with your decision.
If I were you, I\'d want to know what Tom is doing right now.
Even though we know smoking is unhealthy, people still smoke.
I thought Tom would eventually realize Mary didn\'t like him.
Tom gets upset when Mary doesn\'t do what he tells her to do.
Tom got angry because I wasn\'t doing what he asked me to do.
Tom, Mary, John and Alice went to the same elementary school.
Tom and Mary seemed to be very happy to see each other again.
Tom and Mary were worried about getting caught by the police.
I need a list of all the dangerous neighborhoods in the city.
I once knew somebody named Tom, but that was a long time ago.
I only wish I had stopped Tom from doing such a stupid thing.
Tom\'s wide-eyed optimism is beginning to grate on my nerves.
I have two keys for the front door, but I can\'t find either.
Tom and Mary were here earlier, but now they\'ve disappeared.
Tom is very sleepy, because he didn\'t sleep well last night.
Tom will be very disappointed if Mary doesn\'t come to visit.
I don\'t care how much it costs. I\'m going to buy it anyway.
Where\'s your favorite place to go when you want to be alone?
Why did you hire me if you didn\'t think I could do that job?
Would you please tell Tom why you don\'t want him to do that?
You don\'t really think that Tom did that on purpose, do you?
I don\'t think Tom is going to want to go to Boston with you.
I wonder whether or not Tom is responsible for what happened.
I wonder who the next president of the United States will be.
I wondered whether or not Tom thought Mary needed to do that.
I wondered whether or not Tom thought Mary wanted to do that.
I wondered whether or not Tom wanted to go to Boston with us.
Both Mary and Alice were wearing short skirts and high heels.
Can you please tell me where the nearest public telephone is?
I know him by sight, but I have never actually spoken to him.
I still have a lot of work I need to do before I can go home.
I want to find out if Tom is going to go out and eat with us.
I wanted to tell Tom in person, so I drove over to his house.
